DOC.detailed_description: Premenstrual syndrome ( PMS ) deÔ¨Åned recurrence psychological physical symptom luteal phase , remit follicular phase menstrual cycle [ 1 ] .PMS prospectively diagnose use Royal college Obstetricians Gynecologists ( RCOG ) recommend daily record severity problem ( DRSP ) . Women ask fill diary 2 month , woman 30 % increase DRSP score week menses month diagnose PMS . Women PMS invite participate study.The invitation include clear full explanation study patient provide write consent . All patient consent participate include trial . Yasmin , Calver Placebo enclose sequentially numbered similar bottle number use computer generate random table . Women ask choose sealed envelope , envelope contain number allocate jar special instruction use medication . Yasmin take daily 21 day start 2nd day menstruation , Calver placebo take continuously . Neither patient physician aware drug use . Patients categorize 3 group : group1 receive Yasmin cyclically 3 month ( Yasmin , schering , cairo , Egypt ) daily oral placebo , group 2 receive Calver continuously 3 month ( Calver , Marcryl/Vertex , Cairo Egypt ) oral placebo 21 day , group 3 receive daily placebo placebo similar COC 21 day act control group .
